name: Featured Image Notes
author: Drew Rawitz

sections.description: Sometimes you might need to provide image guidelines to your clients who are using the Featured Image meta box. This plugin will allow you to specify different notes for each custom post type that supports Post Thumbnails.
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Featured Image Notes to fill out your notes.
  4. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Why is my custom post type not listed?

Make sure it has Post Thumbnails support for your theme. You can read more about that here: https://codex.wordpress.org/Post_Thumbnails
sections.changelog:

  • Fix to the conditional statement so we are only prepending the note if content exists.
